::: HELL BEAST, not looking to the small diagnostic drone ::: Send a message 
to Mosquitor....tell him to wrangle the other Predacons up and bring them 
home. Its a task I trust he can accomplish.

~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS, in the privacy of a lab that had be kept closed for some 
time, went to contact Quickstrike. Of course, he couldnt use the ship's 
functions without getting caught. But, scince Quickstrike did have control 
over the computers he might risk it. The spider walked up and typed in a 
code. An image of QUickstrike, along with an unfimiliar bot appeared before 
him. Quite strange....
    He glanced around Quickstrike's surroundings. If he was going to get 
attacked there would be little chance of victory due to his leg. And the 
spider had no way to get there in time, unless he could contact 
someone...someone new who didnt know to much about him. ...The Oblitercons! 
:::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: OMINOUS PRIME lurked in the misty fog. Getting through the Highlands of 
the valley was a difficult task, especially in the fog. He had set up a small 
fortification that was specifically set up for intercepting messages. And 
with the battle ending the lines were very busy. One message intrigued the 
Energonian very much. TRANSANULAS had sent a message to the Oblitercons....

 Playback----

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Dear Oblitercons. I have come to understand that you are 
merceneries for higher. I want your services to aid my companian. Do as he 
says and escort him where he wishes. For your payment, I will supply you wil 
a working proto-form. The proto-form needs to scan a lifeform, which you can 
select. Once you have helped my companian, I will deliver the pod containing 
the proto-form in it to you. Quickstrikes coordinates are 445.78....please 
hurry, this is of great urgency!

End transmission---

::: OMINOUS laughed. Prehaps his revenge could be exacted with the 
Oblitercons...OMINOUS decided that he would join this elite group, and work 
for them until he could strike back at TRANSANULAS and destroy HELL BEAST and 
his fraction for good! ::::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON floated about, and finally contacted Shredder ::: 

::: MEGATRON ::: Shredder...I am alive and well. I want you to be in charge 
of the group for the time being. Find Quickstrike and help him. Rat Trap has 
defected, but that is no major loss. With my current form, we can take back 
this ship and then we can destroy the Auto-bots for good!
